exec: tests["Get Azure AD Token"] = !json.error && responseBody !== '' && responseBody !== '{}' && json.access_token !== '';
tests["Get Azure AD Token"] = !json.error && responseBody !== '' && responseBody !== '{}' && json.access_token !== '';

body.raw:
{
"RequestHeader":{
    "SourceSystem":"MLFUniverse",
    "RequestTime":"20210609",
    "BusinessEntity":"BatchOrder",
    "TargetSystem":"D365FO",
    "ReceivedTime":"",
    "ReferenceNo":""
},
"RequestBody":{      
    "Company": "MLF",           	// Required; Company is required field in F&O
	"ItemID": "7100",         		// Required; Field length (20)
	"CWQty": 1.00,					// Optional; 0.00 for WIP items; value for FG; Field Type (Real/Decimal - 2 decimals)
	"TotalWeightQty": 1025.66,		// Required for WIP items as well for FG; Field Type (Real/Decimal - 2 decimals)
	"BatchNumber": "092721_7100",	// Optional; Only available for batch controlled items
	"SerialNumber": "000008",		// Optional; Only available for serial controlled items
	"TransDate": "20210812",  		// Required (YYYYMMDD)
	"ProdDate": "20210812",  		// Required (YYYYMMDD); Same as TransDate in case of Interweigh message
	"SiteID": "BRAM",       		// Required; both for WIP/FG items; Field length (10)
	"WarehouseID": "NDC", 			// Required; both for WIP/FG items; Field length (10)
}	
}
